text: Kenneth Sivertsen (born August 31, 1973) is a Norwegian alpine skier, born in Narvik. He competed in the downhill, giant slalom and Super-G at the Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City in 2002. Sivertsen was Norwegian champion in alpine combined in 1996, and in downhill in 1999. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Alpine skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Norway Category:People from Narvik
title: Kenneth Sivertsen (skier)
